code: export default{login:function login(data){return fetch('http://cfd-reactjs.herokuapp.com/elearning/v4/login',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data)}).then(function(res){return res.json();});},updateInfo:function updateInfo(data){var token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('token'));return fetch('http://cfd-reactjs.herokuapp.com/elearning/v4/profile/update',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token.accessToken)},body:JSON.stringify(data)}).then(function(res){return res.json();});},course:function course(){var token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('token'));return fetch('http://cfd-reactjs.herokuapp.com/elearning/v4/profile/course',{method:'GET',headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token.accessToken)}}).then(function(res){return res.json();});},payment:function payment(){var token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('token'));return fetch('http://cfd-reactjs.herokuapp.com/elearning/v4/profile/payment',{method:'GET',headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token.accessToken)}}).then(function(res){return res.json();});}};
